Detailed Description

Class that encapsulates an 'Action Menu' item.

See also:
DzActionMenu::getItem()

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzActionMenuItem::Type

The types of action menu items

Enumerator:
Separator 

A menu separator (i.e. horizontal divider)

Action 

An action item - a menu entry that activates a DzAction object

CustomAction 

A custom action item - a menu entry that activates a custom action. See DzActionMgr for more about custom actions.

SubMenu 

A submenu action item - a menu entry that opens a submenu

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzActionMenuItem::DzActionMenuItem ( Type  type  ) 

Creates a new action menu item of the given type.

Parameters:
type The type of the new action menu item.
DzActionMenuItem::DzActionMenuItem ( const DzActionMenuItem &  item  ) 

Copy Constructor Creates a new menu item that is a deep-copy of the given item.

Parameters:
item The item to copy.
DzActionMenuItem::~DzActionMenuItem (  ) 

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

QString DzActionMenuItem::getAction (  )  const
Returns:
This function returns an empty string if the action has not been set, or if the type of the item is not Action or CustomAction. If the type is Action, the class name of the DzAction activated by this menu entry is returned. If the type is CustomAction, the name of the action (i.e. "Custom0") is returned.
DzActionMenu * DzActionMenuItem::getSubMenu (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
A pointer to the submenu that is displayed by this menu entry. This function returns NULL if the menu has not been set, or if the type of the item is not SubMenu.
QString DzActionMenuItem::getSubMenuLabel (  )  const
Returns:
The label for this menu entry. This function returns an empty string if the label has not been set, or if the type of the item is not SubMenu.
void DzActionMenuItem::saveItem ( QDomDocument &  doc,
QDomElement &  parent 
) const

Adds the DOM representation of this menu item to the DOM document as a child of the given element. This function is intended for internal use, and is not supported as a part of the SDK.

Parameters:
doc The document to save the menu item to.
parent The element in the document that this menu item's data will be made a child of.
void DzActionMenuItem::setAction ( const QString &  name  ) 

Sets the action activated by the menu item. This call has no effect unless the type of this item is Action.

Parameters:
name The class name of the DzAction that will be activated by this menu item.
void DzActionMenuItem::setSubMenu ( DzActionMenu *  menu  )  [slot]

Sets the menu that is displayed as the submenu when this menu item is activated. This call has no effect unless the type of this item is SubMenu.

Parameters:
menu The menu that is displayed as a submenu when this menu entry is activated. The menu item takes ownership of the menu - the menu will be deleted when this item is destroyed.
void DzActionMenuItem::setSubMenuLabel ( const QString &  text  ) 

Sets the text that is displayed for the submenu in parent menus. This call has no effect unless the type of this item is SubMenu.

Parameters:
text The text that is displayed for this menu entry in parent menus.

Property Documentation

DzActionMenuItem::Type DzActionMenuItem::type [read]
Returns:
The type of the menu item
